attributes.action: Hold Israel to account for breach of human rights in their illegal war on Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Israel has long opressed the Palestinians and we have seen the worst of this in the most recent and illegal attack on who they claim to be the militant group Hamas. In it's actions, Israel has shown the world the carnage it is capable of causing with sheer disrepect of human life. Not only have they breached the principles of human rights, but have also violated international humanitarian law, several United Nations resolutions and the Fourth Geneva Convention. We all have a duty, whatever our beliefs and opinions to voice our concerns in this and stand up for what makes us different to the rest of God's creation - being Human

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
